entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
